entry.title: Thursday: Periods of light snow. High minus 10.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow. Fog patches dissipating this afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 10. Wind chill near minus 17. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Thursday 05 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 14. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of light snow. Fog patches developing overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 14. Wind chill near minus 17. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Thursday 05 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: Periods of light snow. High minus 11. POP 30%
